text: @NYGovCuomo I couldn’t agree more. I contracted COVID-19 from who knows where. The test gave a false neg result but I still ended up horribly ill. The ER doc told me to treat it as covid anyway. Fever for 17 days, intense shivering, trouble breathing, couldn’t lift
